xldoc.name: gst-miscellany
xldoc.title: Miscellaneous work using gst.
xldoc.keywords: logic proofpower gst hol set theory

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: Miscellaneous proof work using the gst axioms.

section.title: Introduction
section.abstract: So far only one thing here, proof of a putative strong infinity axiom for HOL.

sbcol.subsec: The idea here is that instead of axiomatising set theory in Higher Order Logic you chose a strong axiom of infinity and then develop one or more set theories by conservative extension.

section.title: Strong Infinity in HOL
section.abstract: This section demonstrates the truth of a proposed strong infinity principle.

subsec.title: Strong Infinity using Sets

sbcol.subsec:
This is here for the record, I have no plans at present to do the proof.
set_goal([], &qqtel;∃<•∀p•∃q• (p<q /\ (∀x<q• ( (∃y<q, e• (∀Z• ∃u<y• (∀v<x•(v e u <=> Z v)))) /\ (∀F•(∀u<x•(F u)<q) => ∃y<q• ∀u<x•(F u)<y)))) &qqter;);
